channel.title: How do i execute a java program
channel.description:
I'm used to the java of the rsps scene, I never coded outside rsps I found an old program made in java but with only the java files
So my question is, how do I run the application I guess I have to prob make a JAR but how do I start on that then?
Thanks in advance

item.title: How do i execute a java program
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

yo its ok already
I just took an rsps run-batch and changed the main class which is working

Read full topic
item.source: How do i execute a java program

item.title: How do i execute a java program
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

runescape sucks:

Edit: it’s usually the biggest .java file.

Usually if whoever wrote the program is a moron. Just search for the main method and you’ve got your main class.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i execute a java program

item.title: How do i execute a java program
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:3, topic:427581”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=530281.msg3871763#msg3871763 date=1325384151]
You don’t have to make it a .jar, you just have to find the main class.

Edit: it’s usually the biggest .java file.
[/quote]

yeah i just thought about that while getting a drink lol
so I could just use a simple rsps runbatch and change the main class to the main class of the files?[/quote]

Yes unless you want to change your java arguments.

Read full topic
